casebody.data:
Sherred et al., Appellants, v. Estate of Koon et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Sherred v. Estate of Koon, 99 Ohio St.3d 211, 2003-Ohio-3140.]

*212(No. 2002-2175 Submitted June 4, 2003 Decided July 2, 2003.) John W. Waddy Jr.; Perry R. Silverman Co., L.P.A., and Perry R. Silverman, for appellants. Price & Jones and Cheryl L. Ryan, for appellees.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Armstrong v. Best Buy Co., Inc., 99 Ohio St.3d 79, 2003-Ohio-2573, 788 N.E.2d 1088.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Lundberg Stratton and O’Connor, JJ., concur. Pfeifer, J., dissents. O’Donnell, J., not participating.
